title: PLEASE HELP - BETA Account Disabled/Login doesn't exist Fornicus2
body:
My pbe account I have been playing on daily seems to be disabled when I try to login. Also on the forums it tells me that "login combination doesn't exist."

I even had a pinned post on the boards. https://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bugs/BnIwRyLz-for-the-love-of-god-stop-posting-duplicate-posts-please-read

replies.body:
If this is an older PBE account, you may need to create a new one since sign ups have changed.  The [PBE signup page](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/pbe) should allow you to create a new account.  

If that doesn't help, fill out an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and our account team can locate the account and see what happened.

Can you give me insight on how it took almost 4 years for them to disable that account? They said it was because it was "legacy" and made before 1025/2013, but it took 4 years for them to disable it....
